trans-unit.source: Create a custom virtual machine in Azure
trans-unit.target: Create a custom virtual machine in Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create a custom virtual machine in Azure.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create a custom virtual machine in Azure.

trans-unit.source: A custom virtual machine simply means a virtual machine that you create using the From Gallery option because it gives you more configuration choices than the Quick Create option.
trans-unit.target: A custom virtual machine simply means a virtual machine that you create using the From Gallery option because it gives you more configuration choices than the Quick Create option.

trans-unit.source: Connecting the virtual machine to a virtual network.
trans-unit.target: Connecting the virtual machine to a virtual network.

trans-unit.source: Installing the Azure Virtual Machine Agent and Azure Virtual Machine Extensions, such as for antimalware.
trans-unit.target: Installing the Azure Virtual Machine Agent and Azure Virtual Machine Extensions, such as for antimalware.

trans-unit.source: Adding the virtual machine to existing cloud services.
trans-unit.target: Adding the virtual machine to existing cloud services.

trans-unit.source: Adding the virtual machine to an existing Storage account.
trans-unit.target: Adding the virtual machine to an existing Storage account.

trans-unit.source: Adding the virtual machine to an availability set.
trans-unit.target: Adding the virtual machine to an availability set.

trans-unit.source: If you want your virtual machine to use a virtual network so you can connect to it directly by host name or set up cross-premises connections, make sure that you specify the virtual network when you create the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: If you want your virtual machine to use a virtual network so you can connect to it directly by host name or set up cross-premises connections, make sure that you specify the virtual network when you create the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: A virtual machine can be configured to join a virtual network only when you create the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: A virtual machine can be configured to join a virtual network only when you create the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: For details on virtual networks, see <linkText>Azure Virtual Network overview</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: For details on virtual networks, see <linkText>Azure Virtual Network overview</linkText><title></title>.
